verse.name: v1
verse.lines: A sov'reign Protector I have, unseen, yet forever at hand, unchangeably faithful to save, almighty to rule and command.

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: Inspirer and hearer of pray'r, Thou Shepherd and Guardian of Thine, my all to Thy covenant care I sleeping and waking resign.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: If Thou art my Shield and my Sun, the night is no darkness to me; and fast as my moments roll on, they bring me but nearer to Thee.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: Kind Author and Ground of my hope, Thee, Thee, for my God I avow; my glad Ebenezer set up, and own Thou hast helped me till now.

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: I muse on the years that are past, wherein my defense Thou hast proved; nor wilt Thou relinquish at last a sinner so signally loved!
